footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Kamisato Ayaka | Update Date: 08/07/2022 | Editor: Effab1e#2963

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: __Mistsplitter Reforged__ - Ayaka's best damage option. Doing dash>NA>Skill>Burst guarantees all stacks.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__Haran Gepakku Futsu__/__ Summitshaper(shielded)__/__Jade Cutter__ - Comparable options that can be better or worse depending on teams/substats.

__Amenoma Kageuchi__ - Negates all energy issues and allows building more offensive substats. Ayaka's best and only free to play option and is highly recommended to craft and refine.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK % |<goblet>  Cryo DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT DMG/ATK %

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Kamisato Art - Soumetsu
**2)** Normal Attack: Kamisato Art - Kabuki
**3)** Elemental Skill: Kamisato Art - Hyouka

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Building ER substats to reach requirements is the biggest priority.
Not using Amenoma  - 130 to 140%
Using Amenoma - 100%(R5) to 120%(R1)

Because of Blizzard Strayer aim for a maximum 30-40% CRIT Rate on the build.
ATK % circlets can be competitive or better, especially on Mistsplitter builds.
